TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: ɐ p l ɪ s k ɔ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɚ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ d ə s θ ɪ ŋ z ɑː w ɪ ð ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n ʌ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z h ɛ m eɪ b iː ɐ s n a ɡ f ɔːɹ r ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b h uː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m oʊ l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oɪ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n n aʊ s k uː p t ə s t ɹ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d uː əl l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w æ n s t eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNAKE INCONTEXT: sneɪk
SNAKE NOCONTEXT: sneɪ
SNACK INCONTEXT: snaɡ
SNACK NOCONTEXT: snak
BAGS INCONTEXT: bæɡz
BAGS NOCONTEXT: ɛɡz
